00049 /**********************************************************************
00050  * Additional Contributions and Acknowledgements
00051  *   Kalyan Perumalla - Ga Tech
00052  *
00053  *   This implementation is an adaption of the implementation done
00054  *   by Kalyan for Ga Tech Time Warp
00055  **********************************************************************/
00056 
00057 #include <epi.h>
00058 
00059 typedef double KEY_TYPE;
00060 #define KEY(e) (e->ts_next)
00061 
00062 FWD(struct, CHeap);
00063 
00064 DEF(struct, CHeap)
00065 {
00066   long nelems;
00067   int curr_max;
00068   epi_agent **elems; /* Array [0..curr_max] of epi_agent * */
00069 };
00070 
00071 #define SWAP(heap,x,y,t) { \
00072     t = heap->elems[x]; \
00073     heap->elems[x] = heap->elems[y]; \
00074     heap->elems[y] = t; \
00075     heap->elems[x]->heap_index = x; \
00076     heap->elems[y]->heap_index = y; \
00077     }
00078 
00079 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00080 inline epi_agent * HeapPeekTop( CHeap *h )
00081 {
00082   return (h->nelems <= 0) ? 0 : h->elems[0];
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 void sift_down( CHeap *h, int i )
00087 {
00088   int n = h->nelems, k = i, j, c1, c2;
00089   epi_agent * temp;
00090 
00091   if( n <= 1 ) return;
00092 
00093   /* Stops when neither child is "strictly less than" parent */
00094   do{
00095     j = k;
00096     c1 = c2 = 2*k+1;
00097     c2++;
00098     if( c1 < n && KEY(h->elems[c1]) < KEY(h->elems[k]) ) k = c1;
00099     if( c2 < n && KEY(h->elems[c2]) < KEY(h->elems[k]) ) k = c2;
00100     SWAP( h, j, k, temp );
00101   }while( j != k );
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00105 void percolate_up( CHeap *h, int i )
00106 {
00107   int n = h->nelems, k = i, j, p;
00108   epi_agent * temp;
00109 
00110   if( n <= 1 ) return;
00111 
00112   /* Stops when parent is "less than or equal to" child */
00113   do
00114     {
00115       j = k;
00116       if( (p = (k+1)/2) )
00117         {
00118           --p;
00119           if( KEY(h->elems[k]) < KEY(h->elems[p]) ) k = p;
00120         }
00121       SWAP( h, j, k, temp );
00122     }while( j != k );
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126 void pq_enqueue(  void *pq, epi_agent * e )
00127 {
00128   CHeap *h = (CHeap *)pq;
00129 
00130   if( h->nelems >= h->curr_max )
00131     {
00132       h->elems = (epi_agent **)
00133         realloc(h->elems, sizeof(epi_agent *)*(h->curr_max + 50));
00134       if( !h->elems ) {fprintf(stderr,"Can't expand heap!\n"); exit(1);}
00135       //else {fprintf(stderr,"Expanded heap to %d!\n", h->curr_max + 50);}
00136       h->curr_max += 50;
00137     }
00138 
00139   e->heap_index = h->nelems;
00140   h->elems[h->nelems++] = e;
00141   percolate_up( h, h->nelems-1 );
00142 
00143   e->next = NULL;
00144   e->prev = NULL;
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00148 void *
00149 pq_dequeue( void *pq )
00150 {
00151   CHeap *h = (CHeap *)pq;
00152 
00153   if( h->nelems <= 0 )
00154     return 0;
00155   else
00156     {
00157       epi_agent * e = h->elems[0];
00158       h->elems[0] = h->elems[--h->nelems];
00159       h->elems[0]->heap_index = 0;
00160       sift_down( h, 0 );
00161       return e;
00162     }
00163 }
00164 
00165 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166 void DumpBucket( void *pq, FILE *fp )
00167 {
00168   int i;
00169   CHeap *h = (CHeap *)(pq);
00170   fprintf( fp, "[ " );
00171   for( i = 0; i < h->nelems; i++ )
00172     {
00173       fprintf( fp, "%s", ( i && i % 10 == 0 ) ? "\n\t" : "" );
00174       fprintf( fp, "%s%lf", (i ? ", ":""), KEY(h->elems[i]) );
00175     }
00176   fprintf( fp, " ]\n" );
00177   fflush( fp );
00178 }
00179   
00180 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00181 void pq_delete_any(void *pq, epi_agent ** q)
00182 {
00183   CHeap *h = (CHeap *)(pq);
00184   epi_agent * victim = *q;
00185   int i = victim->heap_index;
00186 
00187   if( !(0 <= i && i < h->nelems) || (h->elems[i]->heap_index != i) )
00188     {
00189       fprintf( stderr, "Fatal: Bad node in FEL!\n" ); exit(2);
00190     }
00191   else
00192     {
00193 
00194       h->nelems--;
00195       if( h->nelems > 0 )
00196         {
00197           epi_agent * successor = h->elems[h->nelems];
00198           h->elems[i] = successor;
00199           successor->heap_index = i;
00200           if( KEY(successor) <= KEY(victim) ) percolate_up( h, i );
00201           else sift_down( h, i );
00202         }
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00207 void * pq_create(void)
00208 {
00209   CHeap *h = (CHeap *)malloc(sizeof(CHeap));
00210   h->nelems = 0;
00211   h->curr_max = (10);
00212   h->elems = (epi_agent **)malloc(sizeof(epi_agent *)*h->curr_max);
00213   if( !h->elems ) { fprintf( stderr, "Failed to create heap\n" ); exit(1); }
00214 
00215 /*  printf( "Initialized Heap. Allocated %ld bytes\n", sizeof(epi_agent *)*h->curr_max ); */
00216   fflush(stdout);
00217 
00218   return (void *)h;
00219 }
00220 
00221 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00222 tw_stime pq_minimum(void *pq)
00223 {
00224   epi_agent * e = HeapPeekTop( (CHeap*)(pq) );
00225   double retval = e ? KEY(e) : HUGE_VAL;
00226   return retval;
00227 }
00228 
00229 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230 void *
00231 pq_top(void *pq)
00232 {
00233   return HeapPeekTop( (CHeap*)(pq) );
00234 }
00235 
00236 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00237 
00238 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00239 void *
00240 pq_next(void * h, int next)
00241 {
00242         return ((CHeap *) h)->elems[next];
00243 }
00244 
00245 unsigned int pq_get_size( void *pq )
00246 {
00247   return ( ((CHeap *)pq)->nelems );
00248 }
